title: My freind got me a gift i didnt get it
body: can someone plz help my friend bought me a skin and its been at least like 7 hours after he got me the skin when he bought it i was offlline so is it gltiched

replies.body: dude no place for toxicity here

We'd be happy to look into your specific issue individually.  [Submit a ticket ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new)and our billing team can look into this further, which would be safer than sharing account information over the boards.  We'll respond to your ticket as soon as we can!
